channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- MobileIron Core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- MobileIron Core

item.title: CVE-2021-3198|2024-09-16T19:10:11.444Z -- ivanti -- mobileiron%20core
item.description: By abusing the 'install rpm url' command, an attacker can escape the restricted clish shell on affected versions of Ivanti MobileIron Core. This issue was fixed in version 11.1.0.0.
